name: raiden-wizard-fake-blockchain
description: Run a local ganache blockchain for running integration tests.

scripts.kyber-snapshot: ganache-cli --db node_modules/kyber-network-workshop/db --accounts 10 --defaultBalanceEther 1000 --mnemonic 'gesture rather obey video awake genuine patient base soon parrot upset lounge' --networkId 5777 --debug

author: brainbot labs est.
